Australian Scientific Enterprise

Australian Scientific Enterprise Pty Ltd specialises in manufacturing, freeze drying and custom packaging. We manufacture a large range of specialised products for laboratories and affiliated companies.

Our customers include pathology laboratories (both private and public), equine and other testing laboratories. We also perform highly-customised contract work for other innovative local and large international companies.

We stock a large variety of lyophilised quality control materials ready for shipment to pathology laboratories. We also have a range of quality controls designed specifically for Point of Care applications. Our range of buffer solutions and general purpose reagents are also stocked and ready for immediate shipment.

Custom manufacturing and packaging is provided to a large range of customers and delivered according to the specifications of each contract. We specialise in linear calibration sets and external quality control materials.
